TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Partitioner extends System.Object
public ref class Partitioner abstract sealed

summary.span: Fornisce strategie di partizionamento comuni per matrici, elenchi ed elementi enumerabili.

span.span: Provides common partitioning strategies for arrays, lists, and enumerables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per altre informazioni, vedere [Partitioner personalizzati per PLINQ e TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

span.span: Creates a partitioner.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TSource> source);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (source As IEnumerable(Of TSource)) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: Tipo degli elementi nel tipo enumerabile di origine.

span.span: Type of the elements in source enumerable.
The enumerable to be partitioned.

summary.span: Crea un Partitioner ordinabile da un'istanza di .

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: Partitioner ordinabile basato sulla matrice di input.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks L'ordinamento utilizzato nel partitioner creato è determinato dall'ordine naturale degli elementi recuperati dall'origine enumerabile.The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable. Per ulteriori informazioni ed esempi, vedere [partitioner personalizzati per PLINQ e TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IList<TSource> list, bool loadBalance);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!TSource> list, bool loadBalance) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (list As IList(Of TSource), loadBalance As Boolean) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: Tipo degli elementi nell'insieme di origine.

span.span: Type of the elements in source list.
The list to be partitioned.

param.name: loadBalance
param.span: Valore booleano che indica se il partitioner creato deve bilanciare in modo dinamico il carico tra le partizioni anziché partizionarlo in modo statico.

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the created partitioner should dynamically load balance between partitions rather than statically partition.
